Name: Microsoft Graph Reconnaissance Detections
Author: The Collective Consulting - support@thecollective.eu
Description: This query pack contains 6 analytic rules which are scoped to reconnaissance of Entra ID environments using the Graph API. Adding these to your Sentinel Workspace will generate an incident when activity correlates with what the rule is trying to detect.
Analytic Rules: Analytic Rules/Conditional Access policy enumaration via Graph API.yaml
Analytic Rules/Enterprise applications enumerated via Graph API.yaml
Analytic Rules/Foreign access to mailbox using Graph.yaml
Analytic Rules/Mailbox enumeration using Microsoft Graph.yaml
Analytic Rules/Security groups enumerated via Graph API.yaml
Analytic Rules/Updatable groups enumerated via Graph API.yaml
